mapper.insert: insert into employee (name, username, password, phone, sex, id_number, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
update employee
name = #{name},
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
sex = #{sex},
phone = #{phone},
id_number = #{idNumber},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id};
mapper.select:
select * from employee
name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by create_time
